ARABIC: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِى ضَلَٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The ruling circle of his people said, 'We see you in flagrant error.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The elders of his people replied: "We see clearly that you have gone astray."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The leading men of his people replied: 'We see that you are in palpable error.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: A group of his people said to him, "You are absolutely wrong."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The leaders of his people said, “Indeed we see you in open error.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The leaders of his people said: "Verily, we see you in plain error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The chiefs of his people said: Most surely we see you in clear error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said the Council of his people, 'We see thee in manifest error.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The chieftains of his people said: Lo! we see thee surely in plain error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but the leading men of his people said, "Truly, we see that you are obviously lost in error!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The chiefs of his people said: verily we see thee in error manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The elite of his people said, ‘Indeed we see you in manifest error.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The leaders of his people said: "Ah! we see thee evidently wandering (in mind)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The leaders of his people said: "Verily, we see you in plain error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But the assembly of his nation said: 'We can see that you are in clear error.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The dignitaries among his people said, “We see that you are in obvious error.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Said the eminent among his people, "Indeed, we see you in clear error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:60] The council, of the respected elders, of his people, said: ‘Truly We see you in manifest error’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The chieftains of his people said: Lo! we see you) Noah (surely in plain error) in what you say.
